\bentry

{\dictmeaning{\num{1} (\pArxparx) meTaTxlu; pAvaTige.

\eng{ by degrees} haMtahaMtavAgi; savxlapx savxlapxvAgi.
\num{4} talemAru; oMdu tale; neVravAda vaMshAvaLiya GaTaTx:
\eng{forbidden or prohibited degrees} niSidadhx talemArugaLu; ati
hatitxrada bAMdhavayxda kAraNa vivAha kUDadeMba talemArugaLu.
\num{5} (sAmAjika yA adhikArada) dajeR; aMtasutx; sAthxna.
\num{6} (hoVlikeyalilx) parasapxra -- sithxti, sAthxna, sAthxnamAna:
\eng{each good in its degree} parxtiyoMdakUkx tananx sAthxnadalilx
beleyide.
\num{7} (tiVkaSxNXte, parimANdalilx) maTaTx; GaTaTx; haMta: \eng{to a
high degree} bahu meVlumaTaTxkekx. \eng{to the last degree} koneya
maTaTxdavaregU.
\num{8} (\nAyxshA) aparAdhada maTaTx, dajeR: \eng{murder in the first
degree} modalane dajeRya kole.
\num{9} (pArxviVNayxteya gurutAgi koDuva) padavi: \eng{ honorary
degree} (gaNayxvayxkitxgaLige koDuva) gwrava padavi. \eng{degree day}
padavi (dAna) dina; padavigaLanunx parxdAna mADuva dina.
\num{10} (guNavAcaka, kirxyAvisheVSaNagaLa) parxmANa;mAna:
\eng{positive degree} neYja parxmANa.\eng{comparative degree} tara
parxmANa. \eng{superlative degree} tama parxmANa.
\num{11} (\jAyx) Digirx; koVnagaLa matutx vaqtatxcApagaLa aLataya
EkamAna; vaqtatx paridhiya $1/360$ BAga yA samakoVnada $1/90$ aMsha
(cihenx `${}^\circ $', \udA\ $45^\circ$): \eng{degree of latitude} oMdu
akASxMshada parimANa (sumAru $69$ meYli dUra).
\num{12} (\Bwvi) Digirx; tApada aLateya EkamAna; selisxyasf
padadhxtiyalilx niVru GaniVkarisuva tApa matutx niVru kudiyuva
tApagaLa naDuvaNa aMtarada $1/100$ BAga. 
\num{13} (\saM) savxrASaTxkada oMdu savxra, haMta.
\num{14} vAyxpitx; haravu; parimiti: \eng{each of us in varying
degrees has learned this for himself} namamxlilx parxtiyobabxnU
tananx shakatxyXnusAra idanunx tAneV tiLididAdxne.
\num{15} (\ga) dajeR; yAvudeV biVjagaNita rAshiyalilxruva vividha
padagaLa GAtagaLa peYki atayxMta doDaDxdu.
\num{16} phirxVmeVsananxra dajeR.}}

\alnum{a} rakaSxNegAgi -- haLaLx toVDiko, kaMdaka mADiko.

\num{6} \eng{dig out} 

\alnum{a} (hudugiruvudanunx) agedu tege.

\alnum{b} huDuki mAhiti \mo vanunx paDe; shoVdhisi tiLi: \eng{dig information out of books and reports} pusatxkagaLu hAgU varadigaLiMda mAhitiyanunx huDuku: \eng{dig out the truth} satAyxMshavanunx shoVdhisi tiLi.
\num{7} \eng{dig up}

\alnum{a} (biVLuBUmiyanunx) beVsAyakAkxgi age, toVDu.

\alnum{b} agedu tegeduhAku: \eng{dig up a tree by the roots} maravanunx buDasahita agedu kitutxhAku.

taru: \eng{an old temple was dug up here} ililx haLeya
deVvAlayavoMdanunx agedu hora tegeyalAyitu. 

\alnum{d} horatege; bayaligeLe; huDuki tege; huDuki parxkaTisu: \eng{the news papers love to dig up scandals} vaqtatx patirxkegaLu BarxSATxcAragaLanunx bayaligeLeyalu iSaTxpaDutatxve.}
